AWS allows us to provide granular

egress traffic to the V pcs and subnets
where we keep our data clusters we also

only the right and authorized

the reason that we were we were

couldn't cope to our scaling

necessary to implement our new
architecture as a scalable system from

less so we were able to move more

the availability of new services and the
